Definition at line 116 of file Util.php.

static PCPUtil::createXMLResponse ( $  result,
$  status = "success" 
) [static]

Create a response for the REST server. Passed results have two types of elements:
*page-Element or *userCredentials -Element.

Example:

<response> <smw> <page> <!--here comes the page data--> </page> <userCredetials un="Tester" pw="test" .../> </smw> </response>

See also:
PCPUserCredentials

PCPPage

Parameters:
string $result The result of a function call - an XML element.
string $status The status of the operation: success or failed.
Returns:
string The XML string.

static PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle ( $  title = NULL  )  [static]

If the title sting contains more than one title, return only the first one. The titles are supposed to be separated by a '|'.

Parameters:
string $title
Returns:
string The single title.
